scripts.wagabox:build: docker exec wagabox-2.0.0 bash -c "cd /var/www/html/waga/waboot/wp-content/themes/waboot && npm run composer:update" && npm run assets:build
scripts.build: npm run composer:update && npm run assets:build
scripts.assets:build: npx gulp compile_js && npx gulp compile_css
